text: Mario Chella (16 March 1934 â€“ 13 July 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy from 1983 to 1987. He was born in Udine, Italy. Chella died on 13 July 2022 in Sestri Levante, Italy at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Friuli-Venezia Giulia
title: Mario Chella
